newsitem.title: USA: WMS Industries says court rules against it.
newsitem.headline: WMS Industries says court rules against it.

text.p: WMS Industries Inc said on Friday that a court awarded $32.8 million in damages to International Game Technology in a patent related lawsuit.
WMS had previously reported a charge against earnings for the period ended December 1996 in the amount of the judgement, it said.
WMS Gaming is pursing its appeal of the trial court's finding of liability and intends to appeal the damage award, the company said.
International Gaming Technology vice president of finance Maureen Imus said the company will account for the award conservatively, not recording it until it receives any funds from WMS.
If the award were granted, it would be accounted for as an item outside of operations, Imus said.
